review: I go here sometimes only because my daughter likes their pasta.  I am not a complete fan of their food, but their boneless chicken wings are good.  I find their staff to be friendly.  This is a good place to go if you like to drink, as they have plenty to choose from.
Average service, nothing spectacular, nothing terrible. Food was what could be expected from any Applebee's.

I was meeting friends for a quick beer before heading out and I got here early. I asked the bartender, how long is happy hour? I'm told until, 6. Its 6 now?? Nope, you missed it. I'll have a beer. She grabs a large glass. How much is that glass? $7.50 How much is the pint? (I'm driving) oh.. $4.50 I order a Harpoon and see my friends. I get the check, $5.50 with plus tax. I'm not complaining about a buck. Give me the damn happy hour price! Now my clothes smell like Applebees crappy food, the bartender with all her cleavage hanging out already has me in the red zone, all for 23 seconds...? Epic fail Applebees. Epic fail

Typical casual fast food restaurant. Appetizers are very good, entree's just ok. Tonite I had spinach dip as an app and a blue cheese burger. Spinach dip came out piping hot, and had some nice, chips were warm and salty. Very nice. The burger was fine, I like my beef medirm rare, Applebee's doesn't server it that way, it has to be fully cooked. It was still pretty juicy, the bacon and blue cheese mix well with the beef.
Took care side to go, not impressed, food was cold, service was terrible and no cutlery given after we asked for it when we ordered

I'm writing this while the frustration is still fresh. I went to this Applebee's on a Monday. The bar had five other patrons,  but the unobservant bartender named John (a discredit to the name) was rarely around.  It took over ten minutes to order drinks, and even though we were handed menus, he never asked what we wanted to eat. In fact, if we didn't have the drinks we'd have gone across the street to Ruby Tuesdays, which has GOT to have better service. John never took our order; a barback asked if we needed food. After finishing my drink, the bartender asked if I wanted another. I replied yes, but didn't get a second drink until I asked him about it, even though he printed the receipt first. Talk about incompetent. I am never going to return to this Applebee's. The only reason they got two stars is because the food was exactly what you'd expect, otherwise I'd try to pick a negative amount due solely to the horrible bartender. I know not to expect the A game on Monday, but I figure a joint like Applebee's would at least have standards.

The food and service are ok. However I feel like there is always a longer wait for a table of you have more than 2 people. The parking is also an issue. But there is a park and ride large public lot next door.

YelpBoy was very surprised by Applebee's! After making it a point to stay out of Applebee's for many years, due to the memory of their franchise simply being bottom of the barrel when compared to TGI Fridays, Houlihans etc etc, I made a return (due to the draft beers at Fridays across the street being rancid) and I was absolutely shocked at the changes that have taken place over the years. Sure, it still looks like your average Applebee's but now they offer a craft beer menu, with each beer being fresh, clean and crisp, and the food was much better than I remember--with a menu that seems much more interesting than before. I was very wary when I ordered it, but now I can say confidently, can you beat the Brisket Sliders for a measly $5? Nope. Behind the bar, met Sal and John on two different nights; both good guys that I recommend.

Your review helps others learn about great local I've gone  to this Applebees many times, but this Saturday was very disappointing. My husband and I along with another couple went this past Saturday. First the waiter had no personality and when my friends husband asked a question  he gave us a very odd look. (Sorry I don't remember his name) the salads came and half way through they brought the dinners.( guess they were giving us the bums rush!) the steaks were very tough and the vegetables that were supposed to be steamed were very under cooked also. when the manager came over to see how  we liked the food, we told him the steaks we're tough. He offered another steak but at that time, we couldn't wait, we had a show to catch. The bill came and to our surprise, the manager didn't give us any sort of discount or offer us dessert because of the complaint. We were very disappointed with the whole dinner experience.

Food Is always great. Service also. If you're worried about waiting for a table, Call Ahead. Have been going to this location for years. Always great. Employees are understanding of patrons with children too. Great job!
Food took a very long time to come out, when it arrived it was COLD! So seems to me it was sitting out for awhile before they brought it to me! bleck ewwww

Excellent food and service. Food selection is great and always cooked perfectly and served promptly.  The menu is probably the largest variety of any similar chain of restaurants.  We go there every week for lunch and have an enjoyable meal.  Waitresses and managers are always friendly and concerned that we receive good food and service.  Highly recommended.  Now has good wifi service too.
The food was excellent.   Service was great and clean. Manger came by ask about the service.
Was here (for a funeral lunch break unfortunately) and it was nice. Happy hour has some good deals on beer and mix drinks. And their beer burger was great! Also recommend the green bean fries!

I'm giving them a single star based on one visit over the weekend. We've been there often enough and would based on past result, would have given them 3 starts at most. Their quality is inconsistent. It can be great or it can be awful, depending. Last time around was awful.  The waitress knocked a drink into my wife's lap, and my burger was so f'ing greasy its still laying in me.  The time prior to that, the food was OK, but the drinks were so bad we had to send them back. They're not as horrendous as the Ruby Tuesday in Selden, but not far from it. Time to start putting up with the longer waits for a table at Fridays, I think....

Just went here today, for starters, the service was atrocious! It  easily took us 15 minutes to get our drinks refilled, the food was sub par to say the least and to top it off for some reason the gift card I purchased from Raise would not go through their antiquated system, thus after being informed that it had gone through I deleted the card from my Raise account, only for her to come back and tell me it didn't go through. So now I am out $50. Over all this left a sour taste in my mouth. As a former frequent visitor of this place, it will be a while before I go back.

I went on a Saturday night, around 7pm on Memorial Day weekend- there was maybe a 5 minute wait as the table was set. Service was great, food was typical of any Applebee's. I like that this is located right across the street from hotel - it's very convenient!

3 stars because of the half off apps and the deserts are pretty good but the service is horrid. I went today and had a server named Lisa and she was absolutely the rudest person I've never met in my entire life. First she was extremely rude after taking our orders then she basically threw the glass plates at us that it almost hit someone I was with then she gave us our food WITHOUT any silverware lately she stood over us while we tipped her and counted us in front of us because of her I will never come to this Applebee's again

I have a million complaints about our experience here- but I'll just stick with a few:  They 'closed' before closing time; begrudgingly agreed to serve us food; brought us half there and half 'to go'.  What is the point if you're going to balk the entire time?!  I'd much rather go ANYWHERE else if you are going to make us feel badly about our asking for food, for you being a FOOD establishment.  Thanks for that.   I really have no idea whether the bartender thought she was doing us a favor, a horrible person, and/or just should have a non-people job.  The niceties after we were about to leave were perplexing, possibly because my   ridiculously too-kind companion left a  ridiculously huge tip. Why I still have no idea. We ended up trying to eat it in the parking lot. That being said, the food was inedibly salty. After driving 12 hrs w no food, I had two bites and just could NOT eat this.  I hope this review helps ANYONE, as I really hate 'complaining'- I just thought this needed to be said.
Recently redone. Clean and friendly. The menu is always great and the beer and wine selection always meets my needs.

The food usually comes hot and fresh.  Sometimes you will have a busy night where you server won't get it to you fast enough but that is a rarity here.  I had a problem one time where the food took over an hour to come, but the manager came around and explained somebody in the kitchen got hurt during his shift.  I understood and the manager even comped my meal to make it right. I'd say for a local chain this is pretty good just extremely busy sometimes.

Could sit at the bar and talk to John for hours. The staff here makes me feel like family because of how welcoming and friendly they are. Food is amazing drinks are great and a manager on staff always stops by to see how I'm doing! 10/10 recommend this location

My friend and I come to this Applebee's literally all of the time. I have to say this is the first time I got an extremely nice, attentive, and sweet waitress. Not that any of the servers are bad. But Brittany L, was SUPERB! You can tell she enjoys her job, and really does a great job! I can only say GOOD things about my service tonight. Over all great experience thanks to her!

Standard experience at this location. Ordered food online to be picked up curbside. I must note that the ease of the online ordering process was super! A couple clicks and 15 minutes later, boom, your food is there (use the $5 off coupon for your first online order!). Anyway, I ordered the lunch combo of the steak and bean soup and the Thai shrimp salad. Both were good; just good. The Thai shrimp salad came with two sauces that you are to put on together (not sure how this salad remains around 390 calories given the dressings and fixings), and some crunchies mixed in. The shrimp seemed a little soggy. The soup was fine. Good online ordering experience, okay food.

I honestly never dare to come to a place like applesbees on a saturday night. The crowds can get crazy and with a toddler waiting can be such a nightmare. However i was so pleasantly surprised today. My husband had called around 7 to see how busy they were and they actually took our name down after we told them we were 10mins away from there. When we got their the place was packed as usual but we waited about 5mins and the hostess brought us to our table. After sitting down about 5mins later the waitress came over to get our drinks and we placed our order since we already knew what we wanted and we figured it was gonna be a long wait. Again we were pleasantly surprised we got our appetizer and my son got his entree in less than 10mins! And then our food followed shortly. We had the spinach dip which was amazing! Not overly salty and tasted so good! I ordered the oriental salad. That dressing is so good!! Hubby got the all day brunch burger which he loved! Overall a great experience!!

I've been here a few times with friends but this Applebees is awful compared to others such as the one in Miller Place I go to more often. The last time I was here our waitress took forever to take our order and it wasn't busy at all. Granted, we had a larger table of 8, but she never came to get us refills, the food took over an hour to come out and she was rude when THEIR machines to pay weren't working. When the food finally came out, it was cold and undercooked. Never going to this Applebees again.

Pretty large Applebees. Waitress was nice and the food was decent. Can never go wrong with a burger. I ordered the whiskey burger. Was pretty good. Of course they are not good at cooking meat to the temp you like but I had no expectations. I always ask for medium rare and get well done. Nice quick dinner.

Too bad I couldn't put NO stars! I am up here visiting, and asked for a Blue Moon, the waiter said okay let me show my manager and the took my VALID drivers license and it took them 10 minutes to come and find out that my license isn't valid!?? Are you kidding me? Spoke to the manger who took FOREVER to come to our table to act dumb and say his scanner didn't take my ID. I even had my military ID out and said no and walked away! TERRIBLE management and way to approach customers! Never will I come here again!

Wonderful experience, just excellent! The waiter Rashuan (not sure if that's how you spell it) but he did an amazing job and was very patient and was always checking on our table. I would come back just for this type of customer service!

Horrible! Went in with friends to grab a bite and the hostess proceeds to sit us at a FILTHY table! She literally wiped it down with a dirty dishrag with one swipe and there was still straw wrappers, cherry stems and crumbs left after. When I pointed it out she got an attitude. So I had to use a tissue of my own to clean it. With the unsanitary environment and bad my appetite was ruined. We will not be returning.

Applebees is always a hit or miss. This place is a miss on multiple times I've been here. Service is not the best and neither is the food. Always cold/under cooked. Feel like they don't really care about food, just drinks./
